title: Either Buff Draven Or Re-Add Fervor
body: Champ is borderline unplayable and cant bully anyone in lane so he just gets outscaled unless your support is a god, literally every high elo draven main has been saying he's trash since new runes and nothing has been done to make him viable again.

replies.body: Make the blood brothers great again {{champion:122}} {{champion:119}} .
Tyler seems to be taking klepto. Try that out and see if it's better. (i've noticed no one takes pta)
PTA is bad klepto is just shittier verson of abusing relic and hoping you somehow get a kill and aren't useless lategame.

Aight well you're definitely a moron so thumbs down.
Want to compare draven games played? Or games played with rank1 euw who says same thing? Or any other chall draven main sho agrees none of the new runes are at all good on him.

Press the attack!? Are you kidding me, What kind of caster Draven you've seen autos like a kalista/kogmaw, he's suppose to blow them up in like 2-4 shots by outhealing/critting/tons of true dmg, klepto if you like getting your power spikes earlier. But yeah he used to be such a gamechanger, a fed Draven, gg ff 15-20, now it's laughable once the enemy caught up, he isn't 3 shotting anymore or surviving trades at all, but will still mess them up if they don't focus him.
Yeah, they should give {{champion:119}} back his bleed, I think that would be a solid buff. The bleed scales off of adoration stacks, eh?
Or just give him fervor back so he doenst get 1v1 by vayne in lane :/
